content: Brilliant article! A lot of thoughts you have expressed, are exactly what i have went through, and have made similar conclusions. The external validation is a very important thing to me as well — either to gain acceptance, or to get the needed confidence. But time and again, i realized that people who we once considered masters, who can validate us, are no smarter than us — at which point all that is needed is to make sure we get the process of improving ourselves set up well, to accomplish the tasks we set out for. The balance — between humility to learn and improve, and the belief in what we know, needs to be maintained.
